status_start.jql: project={{project}} AND issuetype=Bug AND status IN (Done,Resolved,Closed) AND updated > startOfWeek(-14d)

status_end.jql: project={{project}} AND issuetype=Bug AND status IN (Done,Resolved,Closed) AND updated > startOfWeek(-14d)

denominator.jql: project={{project}} AND issuetype=Bug AND status IN (Done,Resolved,Closed) AND updated > startOfWeek(-14d)
